commit.message:
cstdlib (at_quick_exit, quick_exit): Provide in C++11 mode.

2013-02-12  Paolo Carlini  <paolo.carlini@oracle.com>

	* include/c_std/cstdlib (at_quick_exit, quick_exit): Provide in
	C++11 mode.

From-SVN: r195974
